text:
@GavinNewsom If you do want your "Govenor" is asking, then your letting him win. He's Wrong! 0.03% chance of death (with already preexisting health conditions) and 96% chance of getting Covid19. 
I would rather take my 4% chance and get a cold then put up with the lies of our Government
